Compendium Part A - Configuration Guidelines (V9.0)

Configuration Manual, 03/2018, A5E43228900-AA

# Compiling and downloading

# 9.4 Compile OS

Create/Update Block Icons

As of PCS 7 V7.0, the "Create/Update Block Icons" function is no longer listed as an option for OS compilation. If the "Derive block icons from the plant hierarchy" check box is set in the properties of a picture, the function is called automatically when the OS is compiled.
Q: Can the 'Create/Update Block Icons' function be manually invoked in PCS 7 V7.0?
A: No, in PCS 7 V7.0, the 'Create/Update Block Icons' function cannot be manually invoked as it is now automatically executed under certain conditions.

As of PCS 7 V7.0, the "Create/Update Block Icons" function is no longer listed as an option for OS compilation. If the "Derive block icons from the plant hierarchy" check box is set in the properties of a picture, the function is called automatically when the OS is compiled.
Q: What is the significance of the 'Create/Update Block Icons' function in PCS 7 versions prior to V7.0?
A: In versions before PCS 7 V7.0, the 'Create/Update Block Icons' function was a manual step required during OS compilation to manage block icons.
